titulo: Desarollador/coordinador de Video Juegos hecho en Unreal Engine 5
descripción:
Somos una empresa de video juegos Chileno-Danes, y estamos bustando un desarollador que en capaz de tambien coordinar, ya que nuestro Product Director, se va de vuelta a Dinamarca. 

El trabajo es presential, en nuestra oficina en Santiahgo Centro. 

Toda nuestras video juegos se desarolla en unreal Engine 5, y tienen la Mythologia Nordica como enfoque. 

El rol sera una combination de lider creativo y desarollador. 

Requiremientos: 
- Creatividad: Nuestra "Product Director" que esta viviendo en Dinamarca. Es necesario poder communicar con el. Controlor y dar ideas al vision, para los demas de los empleados. 
- Coordination de proyectos: Tener en ojo la coordination y progression dario en la empresa. Coordinar con los que estan trabajando desde Dinamarca. 
- Conocimiento de desarollo de video juegos, preferiblemente Unreal Engine 4/5: Debe ser capaz de desarollar su mismo. Ya que somos una empresa pequeña, y no hay sufficiente trabajo de coordination para llenar un puesto completo.
- C++ para unreal Engine. Seria un gran ventaja saber sobre C++ para Unreal Engine 4/5. 
- Ingles intermeriario: Para poder communicarse con los unidades en Dinamarca. Pero Google Translate tambien en una gran ayuda. 
- Que le gusta aprender e investogar, especialmente sobre Mythologia Nordica 

Si te interesa el puesto y piensas que tu calificationes cumplen con los requiremientos, mandanos una application

Do you enjoy bringing people together? Do you like helping people reach their biggest dreams? Are you interested in expanding your world? Then we have great news for you!

Poliglota is a leading language teaching organization that brings people together through languages to expand our world. Poliglota uses social, dynamic and innovative learning methods, enjoying the cultural diversity of our members and coaches all over the world. We have been growing exponentially across Latin America, and as such, we are expanding our team of Language Coaches for English, as well as for other languages such as German, Italian, French and Portuguese.

Teachers! Tutors! Instructors! All are welcome to apply as Freelance Language Coach (Online)

Some of your responsibilities will be the following:
· Share the fundamental values of our company, commitment, adaptability, perseverance, collaboration, and passion.
· Teach learning groups according to CEFR levels A1-A2-B1-B2-C.
· Plan, conduct and assess our 90-minute sessions, using our guidelines and activities.
· Provide students additional practice resources through WhatsApp, using our own educational content.
· Complete regular reports after each session, as well as a final report at the end of the course, to provide feedback on the students' progress and performance.

Benefits
· Development of intercultural growth (students and coach of different nationalities).
· Weekly live trainings, community events.
· Support sessions from Monday to Saturday.
· Learn other languages with the benefit of online groups at a discounted rate.
· Earn a language course by referring a friend to be a Poliglota coach once they finish their first course!

Skills
· Be communicative and an active listener, driven to establish positive and productive learning environments.
· Time and group management of small groups (6 students).
· Diligence, responsibility, resourcefulness, high energy and motivation for teaching.

Knowledge
· Advanced knowledge of English/German/Italian/French/Portuguese (CEFR level) for teaching purposes. Being a native speaker of the language to be taught is desirable but not mandatory.
· Use of technologies in Learning environments.

Requirements
· Experience in language teaching and fluency in the language to be taught.
· Availability to coach 2 or more groups monthly, with 90 minute sessions at 7:00 PM and 9:00 PM from Mondays to Thursdays.
· Being able to work remotely by Zoom.

Optional (Ideal)
· Intermediate or higher level of Spanish.
· Availability and commitment to work 6 months or longer

If you are open to new opportunities teaching Languages and want to belong to one of the leading companies in the field that continues to expand every day, highly motivated to help people reach their biggest dreams, we invite you to apply as a Freelance Language Coach (Online) with us.

Now once again for the people in the back! You’ll have the chance to meet people from all over the world, have fun helping them learn languages, enjoy professional development free of charge, work from the comfort of your own home AND you’ll get paid for all of it! Pretty sweet deal, right?

Why are you still reading this?! Go to our application website at https://www.careers-page.com/poliglotacoach and get to it! Best of luck and we hope to meet you soon!
